name: dainty PP - Red on raw
description:
an original design by Oreaduffy! And screen printed by hand in red on raw cotton!

The sides had been fold over on the outside and sewn with a matching handmade button on each side.

A dainty small padded pouch with frame that snap easily close/open. It can be as a mini wristlet for credit cards, lip gloss, cash, ipod, keys, cellphone(certain models only) etc.

Accompanying cute round 'Cushy' and wrist strap is detachable and double as key holder.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Details

>>approximately 4”(opening)/5"(bottom)wide x 4” high x 2" base(10/13 x 10 x 5)cm

>>outer: 100% unbleached cotton (reinforced)
lining: 100% unbleach cotton(lighter weight)

>>Polyester Fleece is sewn in between the outer material and lining for softness and protection.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Thank you for visiting, do look at my other item and let Macro aka the evil octopus boy amuse you:)

Please visit www.oreaduffy.com to know more about Macro.
